title: To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Simeon Booker in recognition of his achievements in the field of journalism, including reporting during the Civil Rights movement, as well as social and political commentary.
content: This bill directs thenbsp. Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senatenbsp. To arrange for the presentation of a Congressional Gold Medal to Simeon Saunders Booker, Jr. in recognition of his achievements in the field of journalism, including his reporting during the civil rights movement and his social and political commentary.
